metadata.questionText: \text{Find the arc length of a circle with radius 8 cm and angle \frac{\pi}{4} radians.}
metadata.instruction: USE L = RŒò (GIVE ANSWER TO 2 D.P.)
metadata.explanation: Use the arc length formula L = rŒ∏ where r is the radius and Œ∏ is the angle in radians. L = 8 √ó \frac{\pi}{4} = 8 √ó 0.7854 = 6.28 cm.
